example.parse: (S (CONJ و) (VP (PV+PVSUFF_SUBJ:3MS قال) (NP-SBJ (-NONE- *)) (SBAR (SUB_CONJ ان) (S (NP-TPC-1 (NOUN_PROP+CASE_DEF_ACC اسرائيل)) (VP (PRT (NEG_PART لن)) (IV3FS+IV+IVSUFF_MOOD:S تجلس) (NP-SBJ (-NONE- *T*-1)) (S-MNR (VP (ADJ.VN+NSUFF_FEM_SG+CASE_INDEF_ACC مكتوفة) (NP-SBJ-3 (-NONE- *)) (NP-OBJ (-NONE- *-3)))) (NP-TMP (NOUN+CASE_DEF_ACC عند) (SBAR (SUB_CONJ ما) (S (VP (PRT (FUT_PART س)) (IV3FS+IV+IVSUFF_MOOD:I تعود) (NP-SBJ (NP (PUNC ") (DET+NOUN+CASE_DEF_NOM الاعمال) (DET+ADJ+NSUFF_FEM_SG+CASE_DEF_NOM الارهابية) (PUNC ")) (NP-ADV (NOUN+CASE_DEF_ACC ضد) (NP (NP (NOUN+CASE_DEF_GEN سكان) (NP (NOUN_PROP+CASE_INDEF_GEN اسرائيل))) (PP-LOC (PREP في) (NP (DET+NOUN+CASE_DEF_GEN الشمال)))))))))))))) (PUNC .)))

arg.g: if terrorist acts against the population of Israel in the north will return

example.arg: عندما تعود الأعمال الإرهابية ضد سكان إسرائيل في الشمال
